summary: Successfully tested all new login page features including social login buttons, Remember Me checkbox, and Forgot password link. All requirements met with proper functionality and English text throughout.
passed_tests: Login page has 'Continue with Google' button with proper data-testid and functionality
Login page has 'Continue with Facebook' button with proper data-testid and functionality
Login page has 'Remember me' checkbox with proper data-testid and toggle functionality
Login page has 'Forgot password?' link present and accessible
All text on login page is in English - no foreign language content detected
No admin credentials visible anywhere on the page
Email and password fields work correctly with proper data-testids
Sign In button is present with proper data-testid
Social login buttons show 'Coming Soon' toast messages when clicked (expected behavior)
Remember Me checkbox toggles state correctly (unchecked to checked)
Navigation from homepage to login page works correctly
All login page elements remain functional after navigation
Page loads without errors or console issues
Form inputs accept user input correctly
Visual design and layout are clean and professional
